Inflation 📈 shows no signs of going away anytime soon. Here are 5️⃣  things CEOs need to do now to manage through uncertainty:

1️⃣  Use price increases strategically.

https://t.co/1LrFWABFig

2️⃣  Aim for cost visibility and transparency.

Analytics provide visibility into costs 💰 and support real-time decisions about how people work 💼, how the end-to-end supply chain is flowing, and, critically, about areas of future growth. 📈 That is top of mind for CEOs today.

3️⃣  Reset the baseline.

Over the past 18 months, companies have faced major disruption including supply chain issues 📦, halting production and shifting to a remote workforce 💻.

It’s important to recognize that when the operating model changes, so must the baseline.

4️⃣  Make the cost structure more variable.

The focus should be on agility and flexibility for the future. Zero-based cost transformation offers multiple options for increased flexibility, with the entire operating model presenting opportunities for re-thinking costs. 💭

5️⃣  Build operating resilience.

Cost transformation aligns the enterprise operating model with future strategy. It extends into go-to-market strategies, customer service and company culture. But it also improves preparedness and the ability to bounce back from adverse events.
